name: Senioritis
description:
SENIORITIS is a 2D retro-themed platformer about high school. Play as Julian  "JD" Davenport and fight homework assignments! Can you get enough credits to graduate?

The release listed here is the official public demo. This is only Level 1. Please play it and give constructive feedback, follow, and give support!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ALGameDev

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TeamSenioritis

Release Date: Summer 2019?
Genre: 2D Action Platformer
